explanation: [0-0] A man wearing a red shirt and a red beanie is biting a colorful whistle with wide eyes, against a yellow background.

[0-2] Subsequently, the man in the red shirt snaps his fingers with his right hand while blowing the colorful whistle. The scene then switches to a man wearing a yellow shirt and a purple hat, with his eyes closed and his left hand on his face. There is a white laptop in front of the man in the yellow shirt. Then, the man in the yellow shirt opens his eyes and stares at the white laptop in shock.
